name: Pushback
description:
An abstract one-against-many struggle to maintain position.

You have an ever encroaching sense of being unwanted, and you must face it with all of your energy. The weight of ideas wrestle, and multitudinous small thoughts topple heavy truths. Shoving your own way, or fleeing in circles, neither is a home. There is space for many to enjoy the pedestal, but suddenly everyone has started pushing.

  • Winner of Philly Resist Jam.
  • Entry in Indiecade Resist Jam.

For my development I used the following diversifiers.

This is how it Feels

The game raises awareness of how hate speech or unfair accusations feel, and what kind of effect they have on their targets.

Nevertheless, She Persisted

A character stands as one against many.

Thanks For Playing!

-J.J.J.
